system.description:
Summons a gnome, an elemental of the earth, under the caster's control. There must be enough earth, mud or stone in the area for the gnome to manifest. While the spell lasts the gnome will follow the caster's commands; once the spell ends the gnome dissipates back into the earth.

Your GM will have details of gnomes. Each success in the margin will add one dice to one of the gnome's Resistances or Abilities.
